parameters.name: componentBuildVersionArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the component that you want to get. Regex requires the suffix /\d+$.

nested_items.name: requestId
nested_items.description: The request ID that uniquely identifies this request.

nested_items.name: component
nested_items.description: The component object specified in the request.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the component.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the component.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the component.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the component.

nested_items.name: changeDescription
nested_items.description: Describes what change has been made in this version of the component, or what makes this version different from other versions of the component.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The component type specifies whether Image Builder uses the component to build the image or only to test it.

nested_items.name: platform
nested_items.description: The operating system platform of the component.

nested_items.name: supportedOsVersions
nested_items.description: The operating system (OS) version supported by the component. If the OS information is available, Image Builder performs a prefix match against the base image OS version during image recipe creation.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current state of the component.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: Describes how or why the component changed state.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: Contains parameter details for each of the parameters that the component document defined for the component.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of this input parameter.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of input this parameter provides. The currently supported value is 'string'.

nested_items.name: defaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value of this parameter if no input is provided.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: Describes this parameter.

nested_items.name: owner
nested_items.description: The owner of the component.

nested_items.name: data
nested_items.description: Component data contains the YAML document content for the component.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The KMS key identifier used to encrypt the component.

nested_items.name: encrypted
nested_items.description: The encryption status of the component.

nested_items.name: dateCreated
nested_items.description: The date that Image Builder created the component.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: publisher
nested_items.description: Contains the name of the publisher if this is a third-party component. Otherwise, this property is empty.

nested_items.name: obfuscate
nested_items.description: Indicates whether component source is hidden from view in the console, and from component detail results for API, CLI, or SDK operations.

nested_items.name: productCodes
nested_items.description: Contains product codes that are used for billing purposes for Amazon Web Services Marketplace components.

nested_items.name: productCodeId
nested_items.description: For Amazon Web Services Marketplace components, this contains the product code ID that can be stamped onto an EC2 AMI to ensure that components are billed correctly. If this property is empty, it might mean that the component is not published.

nested_items.name: productCodeType
nested_items.description: The owner of the product code that's billed. If this property is empty, it might mean that the component is not published.
